text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Refurbished: Acer AN515-53-55G9 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop (Manufacturer Recertified) is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Fortnite. The build quality of the Refurbished: Acer AN515-53-55G9 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop (Manufacturer Recertified) is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The speakers is also top-notch.
